title: Cath Senker
subtitle:
Charities like Care4Calais help to keep refugees alive in northern France. But we need a political solution that allows refugees a legal route to a safe country to claim sanctuary. I went to help out and to see for myself.
https://cathsenker.co.uk/a-weekend-with-care4calais/¬†‚Ä¶

title: Azil u Srbiji Asylum Protection in Serbia
subtitle: Tonight, 8 buses arrived around 8:30 p.m. in Presevo reception center, with more than 300 refugees (single males) taken from Northern part of Serbia.The camp of Presevo has been closed since summer 2018 and used occasionally as transit registration point.Tonight it‚Äôs started work pic.twitter.com/tm0hTUXOTv

title: Staffs Shrewsbury

title: Sasha Simic
subtitle: We  lost  Harry Smith on this day in 2018. He refused to hate. To the last he stood with refugees and immigrants. He knew the Tories and their system are the enemy. He warned us not to let his past become our future. @Harryslaststand #IstandwithHarrypic.twitter.com/LCnKsQ3CIb

title: Pierre-Emmanuel De Bauw
subtitle:
A privilege to be in #BelgiumPark, #Monaghan, where Belgian refugees fleeing #WW1 were received in 1914 and set up a garment factory that flourished in the following decades. 

 The hospitable community continues the tradition of welcoming refugees up to the present! pic.twitter.com/1L50OPT1SM
